title: BRIEF-Creso Pharma Updates On Status Of Its Proposed Acquisition By Pharmacielo Ltd
text:
BRIEF-Creso Pharma Updates On Status Of Its Proposed Acquisition By Pharmacielo Ltd

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Sep 26, 2019 19:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Creso Pharma Updates On Status Of Its Proposed Acquisition By Pharmacielo Ltd Sept 27 (Reuters) - Creso Pharma Ltd : * UPDATES ON STATUS OF ITS PROPOSED ACQUISITION BY PHARMACIELO LTD * CRESO PHARMA- BDO CORPORATE FINANCE (WA) ISSUED NEW INDEPENDENT EXPERTS REPORT SAYING PHARMACIELO SCHEME IS IN BEST INTEREST OF CO'S SHAREHOLDERS * SUBJECT TO SATISFACTORY CONCLUSION OF ASIC'S REVIEW, CO INTENDS TO PROCEED WITH FIRST COURT HEARING, SCHEDULED ON OCT 2

BRIEF-Creso Pharma Updates On Status Of Its Proposed Acquisition By Pharmacielo Ltd
